models

Class BPCredit

  • java.lang.Object
    • models.BPCredit

  • @Entity
public class BPCredit
extends java.lang.Object
    BPCredit is a OneToOne relation to the User; Meaning every User has his own BPCredit which contains the number of credit he has bought;
    Author:
    Necko
